mapper.select: SELECT b.BROADCAST_SEQ, b.BROADCAST_TITLE, b.BROADCAST_IMAGE, b.BROADCAST_SUMMARY, p.PRODUCT_IMAGE, p.PRODUCT_NM, bp.DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM TB_BROADCAST b LEFT JOIN TB_BROADCAST_PRODUCT bp ON b.BROADCAST_SEQ = bp.BROADCAST_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT p ON bp.PRODUCT_SEQ = p.PRODUCT_SEQ ORDER BY b.BROADCAST_SEQ DESC LIMIT 10
